item.title: 澳大利亚可通过 "温和密度 "计划应对住房危机
item.description: 一份新的报告显示，澳大利亚可以通过 "温和密度 "战略增加近100万套住房的供应量，这种在新西兰成功应用的模式将有助于解决住房危机。【原文：Australia could bolster housing supply by almost 1 million homes through a “gentle density” strategy, a model successfully applied in New Zealand that would help address an accommodation crisis, a new report showed.】

item.title: 三星在折叠式 iPhone 上市前数月首次推出三折手机
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co. Ltd.）发布了其首款所谓的三折智能手机，炫耀其在可折叠设备方面的工程实力，尽管这一更广泛的类别尚未受到主流消费者的青睐。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. unveiled its first so-called trifold smartphone, flaunting its engineering prowess in foldable devices even as the broader category has yet to catch on with mainstream consumers.】

item.title: 贡渥集团的海盗创始人选择了一位全美接班人
item.description: 托尔比约恩-唐奎斯特用三十年的时间将贡渥集团打造成为世界上最大的能源贸易商之一；从早期从苏联解体后的俄罗斯出口燃料，到今天规模庞大的全球业务，每天的石油贸易量足以供应英国和法国的总和。【原文：Torbjörn Törnqvist spent three decades building Gunvor Group into one of the world’s largest energy traders — from early days exporting fuel from post-Soviet Russia, to today’s sprawling global business that trades enough oil every day to supply the UK and France combined.】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会将给企业一个月时间回应执法警告
item.description: 美国衍生品监管机构正在给予公司更多时间，以便在成为执法行动的目标时为自己辩护。【原文：The US derivatives regulator is giving firms more time to defend themselves when they are targeted with enforcement actions.】

item.title: 马来西亚云顶集团私有化失败后将继续上市
item.description: 云顶马来西亚有限公司（Genting Malaysia Bhd.【原文：Genting Malaysia Bhd. will remain listed after Genting Bhd. said it secured a 73.13% stake in its offer to take its Malaysian unit private.】

item.title: 石油保持涨势，交易商关注委内瑞拉和黑海停电问题
item.description: 由于市场在关注美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对委内瑞拉采取的下一步措施，并评估黑海原油出口终端受损造成的影响，石油保持了涨势。【原文：Oil held a gain as the market watched for US President Donald Trump’s next steps on Venezuela, and assessed the fallout from damage to a crude export terminal in the Black Sea.】

item.title: 新西兰央行行长布雷曼称透明度改革必须适合新西兰国情
item.description: 新西兰新任央行行长安娜-布雷曼（Anna Breman）将与货币政策委员会的同事们讨论提高决策透明度的问题，但将确保任何变化都适合当地环境。【原文：New Zealand’s new central bank governor, Anna Breman, will talk to her Monetary Policy Committee colleagues about more transparency around their decision making but will ensure any changes are appropriate for the local environment.】

item.title: 中国78美分的流感疫苗显示疫苗制造商面临价格挤压
item.description: 中国疫苗生产商正陷入急剧衰退，竞争加剧导致价格下降、利润减少，凸显了全球第二大经济体深远的通货紧缩压力。【原文：Chinese vaccine makers are caught in a steep downturn, as intensifying competition pushes prices lower and erodes profits, underscoring the far-reaching deflationary pressure across the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 白银因过热担忧从历史高位回落
item.description: 白银从创纪录的高位回落，一个关键的技术指标显示，六天的反弹已使白银进入超买区域。黄金也有所回落。【原文：Silver retreated from a record high, with a key technical indicator showing that a six-day rally has taken the white metal into overbought territory. Gold also edged down.】

item.title: 凯雷出售 Roomba 制造商债务，破产风险迫在眉睫
item.description: 在 Roomba 真空吸尘器制造商努力避免可能的破产申请之际，凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. sold a troubled loan it provided to iRobot Corp. less than three years ago as the maker of Roomba vacuum cleaners is trying to stave off a potential bankruptcy filing.】

item.title: 阿尔伯塔省表示，通往加拿大海岸的新石油管道可能有 50% 为土著所有
item.description: 艾伯塔省省长达尼埃尔-史密斯（Danielle Smith）表示，拟议中的一条通往不列颠哥伦比亚省北部海岸的新石油管道将有多达 50% 的所有权归土著团体所有。【原文：Alberta Premier Danielle Smith says a proposed new oil pipeline to the northern British Columbia coast would be as much as 50% owned by Indigenous groups.】

item.title: 韩国通胀保持稳定，降息前景黯淡
item.description: 韩国 11 月份的消费者通胀率保持稳定，这使央行有更多理由对货币宽松政策保持谨慎，因为当局仍然担心房地产市场的持续上涨会引发金融失衡。【原文：South Korea’s consumer inflation held steady in November, giving the central bank more reason to stay cautious about monetary easing as authorities remain wary that a persistent property market rally could kindle financial imbalances.】

item.title: Danantara 斥资 14 亿美元收购 Garuda 公司，成为改革的关键考验
item.description: 印尼主权财富基金达纳塔拉（Danantara）在国有企业重组方面的势头日益强劲，这使其对印尼鹰航空公司（PT Garuda Indonesia）的 14 亿美元押注成为新的焦点，也是对其重振其他陷入困境的公司的能力的一次关键考验。【原文：Indonesian sovereign wealth fund Danantara’s growing momentum in state-firm restructuring is putting fresh focus on its $1.4 billion bet on PT Garuda Indonesia, a key test of its ability to revive other troubled companies.】

item.title: 亚洲股市走高，日元守住周一涨幅：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市周二早盘上涨，一反隔夜拖累华尔街的风险情绪。在有关日本央行可能加息的猜测波及全球市场后，日元持稳。【原文：Asian stocks were set for early gains Tuesday, defying the risk-off tone that dragged down Wall Street overnight. The yen was steady after speculation about potential Bank of Japan rate hikes rippled through global markets.】

item.title: 苹果公司人工智能主管约翰-詹南德雷亚（John Giannandrea）将在混乱的任期后离职
item.description: 苹果公司人工智能主管约翰-吉安南德雷亚（John Giannandrea）即将卸任，结束其动荡的任期，其中包括在进入生成式人工智能领域时的失误。【原文：Apple Inc. artificial intelligence head John Giannandrea is stepping down from the role, capping a tumultuous tenure that included a fumbled entry into generative AI.】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼称银行监管机构正在制定稳定币规则
item.description: 美联储最高级别的银行警察计划在周二告诉众议院立法者，她将致力于为银行和稳定币制定新规则，因为监管机构寻求确保华尔街、金融科技公司和加密货币公司之间的良性竞争。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s top bank cop plans to tell House lawmakers Tuesday that she will work to establish new rules for banks and stablecoins, as regulators seek to ensure healthy competition between Wall Street, fintechs and crypto firms.】

item.title: 人工智能数据中心公司 Iren 寻求发行 20 亿美元可转换债券
item.description: Iren Ltd. 是一家专注于人工智能和高性能计算的数据中心公司，正寻求通过发行两期可转换债券筹集 20 亿美元。【原文：Iren Ltd., a data center firm focused on artificial intelligence and high-performance computing, is seeking to raise $2 billion across two convertible bond issues.】

item.title: 战胜贸易压力，中国人民币将迎来 2020 年以来最好的一年
item.description: 随着对中国资产和经济日益增长的乐观情绪超过了对美国贸易紧张局势的担忧，中国的人民币正朝着五年来最好的年度表现迈进。【原文：China’s yuan is heading for its best annual performance in five years as growing optimism about the nation’s assets and economy outweighs concerns over US trade tensions.】

item.title: 亚马逊在美国两座城市进行 "超快 "送货测试
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）计划在费城及其家乡西雅图开展一项测试计划，在 30 分钟内提供数百种家庭用品的送货服务，其中包括一些新鲜杂货和非处方药物。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. plans to offer deliveries of hundreds of household items, including some fresh groceries and over-the-counter medicines, within 30 minutes in a test program beginning in Philadelphia and its home city of Seattle.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟在新一轮竞购中获得 Netflix 大部分现金报价
item.description: 据熟悉相关讨论的人士透露，华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.【原文：Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. was fielding a second round of bids on Monday, including a mostly cash offer from Netflix Inc., in an auction that could wrap up in the coming days or weeks, according to people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: ASX 称已解决公司公告封锁问题
item.description: 澳大利亚证券交易所（ASX）称，周二所有公告都将按预期处理，而周一的技术故障导致公司声明中断数小时，为该交易所增添了一系列事故。【原文：ASX Ltd. said all announcements are processing as expected on Tuesday, after a technical outage stopped company statements for hours on Monday, adding to a list of mishaps for the exchange.】

item.title: Vanguard 将允许加密 ETF 在其平台上运行
item.description: 全球第二大资产管理公司先锋集团（Vanguard Group）决定允许主要持有加密货币的 ETF 和共同基金在其平台上进行交易，从而扭转了长期以来的立场。【原文：Vanguard Group, the world’s second-largest asset manager, has decided to allow ETFs and mutual funds that primarily hold cryptocurrencies to be traded on its platform, reversing a longstanding position.】

item.title: Blackstone 出售拉斯维加斯大道度假村 8 亿美元股份
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 将向 Realty Income Corp. 出售 CityCenter Las Vegas 综合体的优先股权，在这笔交易中，这家另类资产管理公司可兑现其投资，同时保留对该物业的控制权。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is selling a preferred equity stake in the CityCenter Las Vegas complex to Realty Income Corp. in a deal that lets the alternative asset manager cash in on its investment while retaining control of the property.】

item.title: 被誉为 "年轻的特斯拉 "的电动飞机制造商赢得分析师青睐
item.description: 华尔街看好贝塔科技公司（Beta Technologies Inc.【原文：Wall Street is bullish on Beta Technologies Inc., calling the electric-powered plane maker an early leader in the regional aircraft industry.】

item.title: 关税冲击销售额，阿尔戈马钢铁公司将裁员 40
item.description: 加拿大钢铁制造商阿尔戈马钢铁集团（Algoma Steel Group Inc.【原文：Canadian steelmaker Algoma Steel Group Inc. will let go of 1,000 employees and close its blast furnace in northern Ontario within months as it seeks to stem losses resulting from US tariffs.】

item.title: 佛蒙特州小型工作学院因招生人数减少将停止教学
item.description: 斯特林学院（Sterling College）是佛蒙特州北部的一所小学院，只有不到 40 名学生，它计划在小规模学校难以为继的时候，结束其学位课程，变现少量资产以偿还债务，并看看能否重新规划自己的使命。【原文：Sterling College, a tiny college in northern Vermont with less than 40 students, plans to wind down its degree programs, liquidate a handful of assets to pay off debt and see if it can re-imagine its mission at a time when small schools are struggling to stay afloat.】

item.title: 巴里克分拆提案使内华达州黄金资产成为并购焦点
item.description: 据分析师称，巴里克矿业公司（Barrick Mining Corp. ）提出的将其在美国的资产从其在风险较高国家的庞大投资组合中剥离出来的建议，将激起竞争对手矿商的兴趣。【原文：Barrick Mining Corp.’s proposal to hive off its US assets from its sprawling portfolio in riskier countries will pique the interest of rival miners, according to analysts.】

item.title: 澳大利亚国内生产总值将创三年新高，加息问题备受争议
item.description: 澳大利亚上一季度的经济增长速度可能是三年来最快的，同时通胀率也有所上升，这促使交易商和一些经济学家打赌储备银行的下一步行动将是加息。【原文：Australia’s economic growth probably accelerated at the fastest pace in three years last quarter, coinciding with hotter inflation that’s prompted traders and some economists to wager the Reserve Bank’s next move will be an interest-rate increase.】

item.title: 乌克兰提出以债券取代与增长挂钩的认股权证
item.description: 乌克兰开始将与经济增长相关的证券兑换成债券，因为在与一批私人债权人进行新一轮谈判后，乌克兰正寻求重组 32 亿美元债务的条款。【原文：Ukraine started a process to exchange securities linked to economic growth into bonds as it seeks to restructure the terms of $3.2 billion debt after another round of talks with a group of private creditors.】
